00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_COMB_H
00012 #define TT_COMB_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_comb:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 // int                          sr;                                                             *** Inherited: Holds local sample rate
00028                 tt_sample_vector        memory, memwriteptr, alloc;             // Internal Stuff for the comb filter
00029                 //float                         delaysize;
00030                 long                            delay;
00031                 float                           msdelay;
00032                 float                           comb_fb_coef;
00033         
00034                 tt_attribute_value              lowpass_feedback;                       // lowpass filter parameters
00035                 tt_attribute_value              lowpass_coef;
00036                 tt_attribute_value              lowpass_frequency;
00037                 tt_attribute_value              decay;                                          // comb filter parameters
00038                 tt_attribute_value              clipping;
00039                 tt_attribute_value              buffersize;
00040                 long                                    buffersize_in_samples;
00041         
00042         
00043         public:
00044                 // void set_sr(int);                                                    *** Inherited: Sets local sample rate
00045                 // int get_sr();                                                                *** Inherited: Retrieves local sample rate
00046                 // void set_global_sr(int);                                             *** Inherited: Sets global sample rate
00047                 // int get_global_sr();                                                 *** Inherited: Retrieves global sample rate
00048 
00049                 enum selectors{                                                                 // Attribute Selectors
00050                         k_feedback,
00051                         k_clip,
00052                         k_delay,
00053                         k_delay_static,
00054                         k_decay,
00055                         k_cutoff_frequency,
00056                         k_buffersize,
00057                 };
00058                 
00059 
00060                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00061                 tt_comb(tt_attribute_value arg)                         // Constructor          
00062                 {
00063                         long i;
00064                         alloc = memwriteptr = memory = 0;
00065                         buffersize = arg > 24 ? arg : 25;               // init the size of the delay buffer - minimum is 25
00066                 
00067                         // ALLOCATE MEMORY BUFFER
00068                         buffersize_in_samples = (long int)(buffersize * (sr * 0.001));
00069                         if (buffersize_in_samples < 24)                 // minimum delay buffer size is 24 samples
00070                                         buffersize_in_samples = 24;
00071                         alloc = (float *)mem_alloc((buffersize_in_samples + 4) * sizeof(float));
00072                         for (i = 0; i < buffersize_in_samples + 4; i++)
00073                                 alloc[i] = 0.;
00074                         memory = alloc + 1;
00075                 
00076                         // SET DEFAULTS
00077                         msdelay = clip((float)50,(float)1,arg);                 // the initial delay time
00078                         //delay = 0;
00079                         comb_fb_coef = 0.9;                                     // the initial feedback coefficient
00080                         clipping = 1.0;                                         // the initial toggle state for autoclipping
00081                         lowpass_coef = 0.1;                             // lpass
00082                         lowpass_feedback = 0.;                          // init the feedback sample
00083                 
00084                         delay = clip(buffersize_in_samples - 4, long(1), buffersize_in_samples);
00085                         memwriteptr = memory + delay;
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 ~tt_comb(void)                                                  // Destructor
00089                 {
00090                         mem_free(alloc);
00091                 }
00092 
00093 
00094                 // ATTRIBUTES
00095                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00096                 {
00097                         double radians;
00098                         
00099                         switch (sel){
00100                                 case k_cutoff_frequency:
00101                                         lowpass_frequency = val;
00102                                         radians = hertz_to_radians(lowpass_frequency);
00103                                         lowpass_coef = clip(radians / pi, 0.0, 1.0);                    
00104                                         break;
00105                                 case k_feedback:
00106                                         comb_fb_coef = val;
00107                                         decay = feedback_to_decay(comb_fb_coef, msdelay);
00108                                         break;
00109                                 case k_clip:
00110                                         clipping = val;
00111                                         break;
00112                                 case k_delay:
00113                                         msdelay = val;
00114                                         delay = clip((long)(msdelay * (sr * 0.001)),(long)1, buffersize_in_samples);
00115                                         comb_fb_coef = decay_to_feedback(decay, msdelay);
00116                                         break;
00117                                 case k_delay_static:    // Doesn't goof with the feedback coef
00118                                         msdelay = val;
00119                                         delay = clip((long)(msdelay * (sr * 0.001)),(long)1,buffersize_in_samples);
00120                                         break;
00121                                 case k_decay:
00122                                         decay = val;
00123                                         comb_fb_coef = decay_to_feedback(decay, msdelay);
00124                                         break;
00125                         }
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00129                 {
00130                         switch (sel){
00131                                 case k_cutoff_frequency:
00132                                         return lowpass_frequency;
00133                                 case k_feedback:
00134                                         return comb_fb_coef;
00135                                 case k_clip:
00136                                         return clipping;
00137                                 case k_delay:
00138                                         return msdelay;
00139                                 case k_decay:
00140                                         return decay;
00141                                 default:
00142                                         return 0.0;
00143                         }
00144                 }
00145                 
00146                 
00147                 // DSP LOOP
00148                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00149                 {
00150                         float comb_fb_sample;
00151                         float *mem_end, *mem_readptr;
00152                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00153 
00154                         while(temp_vs--){
00155                                 mem_end = memory + buffersize_in_samples;
00156                                 mem_readptr = memwriteptr - delay;
00157                         
00158                                 if (mem_readptr < memory)
00159                                         mem_readptr = mem_end - (memory - mem_readptr);
00160                         
00161                                 comb_fb_sample = *mem_readptr;
00162                         
00163                                 // LOWPASS FILTER
00164                                 comb_fb_sample = anti_denormal((comb_fb_sample * lowpass_coef) + (lowpass_feedback * (1 - lowpass_coef))); 
00165                                 lowpass_feedback = comb_fb_sample;
00166                         
00167                                 // CLIPPING
00168                                 if (clipping != 0)
00169                                         comb_fb_sample = clip(comb_fb_sample, clipping * -1, clipping);
00170                         
00171                                 // CALCULATION & OUTPUT
00172                                 *out->vector++ = *memwriteptr++ = anti_denormal(*in->vector++ + (comb_fb_coef * comb_fb_sample));
00173                         
00174                                 //WRAP THE HEADS
00175                                 if (++mem_readptr >= mem_end)
00176                                         mem_readptr = memory;
00177                                 if (memwriteptr >= mem_end)
00178                                         memwriteptr = memory;
00179                         }
00180                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00181                 }
00182 
00183 
00184                 // ADDITIONAL METHODS ****************************************************
00185 
00186                 // clear
00187                 void clear()
00188                 {
00189                         long i;
00190                         for (i=0; i<(buffersize_in_samples + 4); i++) 
00191                                 alloc[i] = 0.0;
00192                         lowpass_feedback = 0.0; 
00193                 }
00194                 
00195                 // set sample-rate (override the inherited method)
00196                 void set_sr(int value)
00197                 {
00198                         sr = value;
00199                         r_sr = 1.0 / value;
00200                         m_sr = sr * 0.001;
00201                         
00202                         set_attr(k_cutoff_frequency,    lowpass_frequency);
00203                         set_attr(k_delay,                               msdelay);
00204                 }               
00205 
00206                 
00207 };
00208 
00209 
00210 #endif          // TT_COMB_H
